Rochester.Court\u2013Exchange Building: Court Exchange Building-National Casket Company is a historic industrial and commercial building located at Rochester in Monroe County, New York. It is a six-story, brick structure with Richardsonian Romanesque details designed by Harvey Ellis and built in 1881 for Samuel Stein, a local manufacturer of wooden caskets. In 1890, Stein merged with several other casket manufacturers across the country to form the National Casket Company.
